content.rendered:
Svein O. Staalen has over 20 years’ professional experience from law firms and in-house legal positions, with particular experience from maritime and energy industries. He holds a Master’s of Law degree from the University of Oslo and a Diploma in English Commercial Law from the College of Law, London. Mr. Staalen is a Norwegian citizen and resides in Bærum, Norway.

Contact

jetpack-related-posts.title: Corporate Governance
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs style="modern" shape="square" spacing="2" active_section="1" no_fill_content_area="true"][vc_tta_section title="Policy" tab_id="corporate-governance-policy"][vc_column_text]In accordance with the Norwegian recommendation for corporate governance, the Board of Directors of AqualisBraemar ASA has prepared this policy document  and will  place emphasis on adhering to the standard in the areas addressed by this. Following the full document presentation of the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Yvonne Litsheim Sandvold  |  Board Member
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ms Sandvold is the Chief Operating Officer of Frognerbygg AS, and has extensive experience from the Norwegian real estate industry.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Haakon Brandrud  |  Director of Strategy and Corporate Development
Synne Syrrist  |  Board Member
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ms Syrrist is an independent business consultant, and has extensive experience as a non-executive director of both private and public companies.
